field.name: summary
field.value: type and service looks interchanged in:: The basics >Using the configuration file section

field.name: description
field.value:
The basics >Using the configuration file >
<component id="alarm.notifier" service="GettingStartedPart1.IFailureNotifier, GettingStartedPart1" type="GettingStartedPart1.AlarmFailureNotifier, GettingStartedPart1" />
please verify..

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text:
The page is correct. The service is the interface, while the type is the implementation.
If you need more information on Windsor's XML configuration syntax see: http://www.castleproject.org/container/documentation/trunk/manual/windsorconfigref.html
